entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NET10] Open Telemetry Investigations #28875
    .NET 10.0-preview5
  • [.NET10] Epic: Investigate paths to help users be more successful discovering memory and layout issues #28874
    .NET 10.0-preview4
  • Annotate remaining `*Converter` classes for nullability #28860
    .NET 10.0-preview5
  • [NET10] Audit Obsoleted platform APIs #28858
    .NET 10.0-preview6
  • Remove usage of MessagingCenter for showing dialogs and alerts #28857
    .NET 10.0-preview5
  • Remove internal usage of MessagingCenter #28855
    .NET 10.0-preview7
  • [NET10] Obsolete BackgroundColor #28854
    .NET 10 Planning
  • pre-defined xmlns prefixes #28850
    .NET 10 Planning
  • make the default xmlns declaration optional #28849
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Font size changes after focus when using contenteditable body in MAUI WebView on iOS #28848
    Backlog
  • Implicit global xmlns #28847
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Global xmlns #28846
    .NET 10 Planning
  • xmlns aggregation #28843
    .NET 10 Planning
  • protect maui xmlns from overloading #28839
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Incorrect Text Color Applied to Selected Tab in TabbedPage on Android #28838
    Backlog
  • XAML xmlns simplifications #28836
    .NET 10.0-preview4

Closed

  • Visibility Property Not Updating as Expected in .NET MAUI #28677
    .NET 9 SR5.1
  • [9.0.50] CollectionView display is broken when setting IsVisible after items are added #28415
    .NET 9 SR6
  • Version 8.0.15 of package microsoft.netcore.app.runtime.mono.android-arm64.msi.x64 not found #28866
  • MAUI project : FlyoutBackgroundColor and FlyoutBackground not working on windows when the FlyoutBehavior is locked after upgrade from 17.3 to 17.4 #11288
  • Flyout background doesn't change when it's locked #12825
  • Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Element: Warning: The RealParent on Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Grid has been Garbage Collected. This should never happen. #28853
  • Microsoft.iOS version increase causing linker issue #28859
  • [iOS] InvalidOperationException for ListView with Html Label #28861
  • MeasureInvalidated events are now fired too often #25264
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • [net10.0] Remove MessagingCenter #28856
  • Allow consuming XmlnsDefintiion from current assembly #28840
    .NET 10 Planning
  • An activity indicator in a collectionview header is not displayed #28732
    .NET 9 Servicing

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert "Revert "Cleanup virtual layer measure invalidation (#28756)" (#28872)" #28873
    community ✨
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr5] Backport uitest fixes to .NET9 SR5 #28871
    .NET 9 SR5.1
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr5] Revert Applying visibility change to child controls #28869
    .NET 9 SR5.1
  • Revert "[Accessibility] Add 'button' for TalkBalk on Android Tap Gesture Recognizers" #28868
    p/0, .NET 9 SR6
  • [2025/04/11] Candidate - In Flight Branch #28867
  • Improve TFM condition for sample content template #28865
    area-templates
  • The footer position is not on the far right of the horizontal grid - fix #28864
    p/0, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • [net10.0] Merge main to net10 #28862
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • Fixed the span text disappeared in label when setting the font attribute on span and setting an implicit style for Label on content page #28851
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion
  • Avoiding issues installing Appium on Linux #28845
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [Android] Fixed the Incorrect Text Color Applied to Selected Tab in TabbedPage #28844
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fix for the File.ContentType from MediaPicker not being in valid MIME format #28842
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, essentials-file-picker
  • Fixed - MAUI WebViewer not working on MacOS even after allowing permissions to wkWebView #28841
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, area-controls-webview, partner/syncfusion

Merged

  • Revert Applying visibility change to child controls #28768
    p/0, area-controls-general, .NET 9 SR6
  • Update Versions.props 9.0.51 #28870
  • Revert "Cleanup virtual layer measure invalidation" #28872
  • Revert "Fix HideSoftInputOnTapped Not Working Net9 " #28802
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, test-flight
  • [Windows] - Fix Visual State Issue with Picker TextColor After Navigation #28746
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-picker, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Test case failure in PR 28486 #28780
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion, test-flight
  • Cleanup virtual layer measure invalidation #28756
    area-layout, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6

Updated

  • Start adding the ability to intercept all requests #28876
    .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [Android] Added Platform specific ripple color #23599
    proposal/open, community ✨, area-controls-button, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [iOS] Support for KeepLastItemInView for CV2 #28720
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, collectionview-cv2, .NET 9 SR7
  • [2025/04/07] Staging - In Flight Branch #28486
    area-infrastructure, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [iOS] Inherit AccessibilityTraits for views wrapped inside a WrapperView #27088
    platform/iOS 🍎, do-not-merge, community ✨, area-controls-general, t/a11y, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Windows] Upgrade to Windows App SDK 1.7 #28499
    platform/windows 🪟, area-infrastructure, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • [HybridWebView] Refactor and convert the HybridWebView.js file into a TypeScript file #27183
    area-controls-hybridwebview, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Android] Overriding back button functionality with OnBackButtonPressed returning false in a modally pushed page causes stack overflow - fix #28812
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, area-controls-modal, .NET 9 SR7
  • ToolbarItem behavior with ImageSource iOS - fix #28833
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar
  • Include all platforms in multi project template #28766
    area-templates, .NET 9 SR7
  • Stop iOS SetNeedsLayout propagation by looking at VisualElement computed Constraint #28479
    area-layout, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Update Test HostApp to not use TableView #28830
    area-controls-collectionview, area-testing, area-controls-listview
  • [iOS] Replaced MeasureInvalidated with IPlatformMeasureInvalidationController for Shell Flyout's Footer #28775
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell
  • [NET10] Replace the obsolete RunJavaScriptTextInputPanel #28531
    proposal/open, area-blazor, t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • Replace MessagingCenter in AlertManager #27888
    t/breaking 💥, proposal/open, area-controls-dialogalert, area-controls-dialog, .NET 10.0-preview5
  • Nullable TimePicker (make Time nullable) #27930
    t/breaking 💥, area-controls-datetimepicker, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • Nullable DatePicker (make Date, MinimumDate & MaximumDate nullable) #27921
    t/breaking 💥, area-controls-datetimepicker, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [Enhancement] Changes in navigation events parameters #28384
    t/enhancement ☀️, proposal/open, area-navigation
  • [net10.0] Trimmable view handlers #28357
    proposal/open, area-core-hosting
  • [NET10] Add global resources and configuration method #28649
    proposal/open, area-xaml, area-core-hosting, community ✨, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • Add Binding.ConverterCulture #28595
    t/breaking 💥, proposal/open, area-xaml, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [NET10] Enable Nullability on ShellPageRendererTracker #28441
    proposal/open, area-controls-shell
  • [iOS ]Fix for issue -> Disconnecting Map Handler causes Map to crash on second page entrance and moving to region #28795
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-map
  • Fixed Footer not displayed at the Bottom When EmptyView in CV2 #28681
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS/Mac] Fixed the Border Rendering issues in CollectionViewHandler2 #27801
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, collectionview-cv2, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for FlyoutItem in overflow menu not fully interactable #27575
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fix Numeric Entry not accepting the appropriate Decimal Separator #27376
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-entry, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fixed CollectionView throws NRE when value of IsGrouped property is changed to false #27331
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for Grouping collection view without data template results in displaying the default string representation of the object #28617
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fixed Shell.SearchHandler ClearPlaceholderIcon Color Issue #28601
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix Path Rendering Issue Inside StackLayout When Margin Is Set #28071
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Migration of Compatibility.Core platform-specific unit tests into device tests - 6 #28399
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] - Resolved Proper Rendering of Dynamic Header/Footer Updates in CV2 #28641
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Feature Matrix UITest Cases for CollectionView EmptyView Feature #28679
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [MacOS] Fixed NullReferenceException when using ImagePaint #28726
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fixed the CollectionView Header and Footer Do Not Align with Horizontal ItemsLayout When EmptyView is Displayed" #28779
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fix for Transparent Background Color not applied to WebView #28804
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-webview, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Trigger OnNavigatedTo method when hide the nav bar and using sw… #28694
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • [iOS] CollectionView with header and "complex" item will have the wrong position after a refresh with a RefreshView #26575
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed the Label text is cropped inside the border control with a specific padding value on certain Android devices #28259
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, area-controls-border, partner/syncfusion
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #28203
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
